caption.title: ribbon representation and VdW surface of the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 2’-O-methyltransferase 3D structure (PDB 6W61, 2.0 Å, Nsp16, pink) in complex with its Nsp10 cofactor (light blue). The zinc and chloride ions are represented as gray and green spheres, respectively. Image created using Maestro, release 2020-1 (Maestro, Schrödinger, LLC, New York, NY, 2020).
